short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remember what you have to do!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tasker is a simple and practical Chrome extension designed to help you organize your tasks and never forget anything. With Tasker, you can easily add, track, and manage your to-do lists directly from your browser.

Key Features:

Quick task addition : Jot down your ideas and priorities with just one click.
Task tracking : Check off completed tasks.
Local saving : All your tasks are saved directly in your browser, even after restarting.
Minimalist interface : An intuitive and lightweight interface, perfect for focusing on what matters.

Tasker is the perfect tool to manage your daily to-do lists directly from your browser without relying on complex applications. Add it now to stay organized and productive!
